name: Messenger SMS & MMS
description: Messenger SMS & MMS is an instant messaging app for android. Its a great Messaging app. Fully customizable by you! Send 3000+ new emojis, funny faces, stickers, GIFs &text messages via SMS messages. Sending funny SMS messages. Sending picture, audio, video MMS messages to share the amazing moment. Sending GIFs and emoji messages to express yourself better. A funny SMS messages app to replace stock messages app!  Messenger SMS & MMS: Send messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS. Texting SMS messages has never been so great with countless emoji, GIF, sticker, theme, private box, SMS blocker, SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Enjoy sending & blocking text messages with funny SMS messages.  Messenger SMS & MMS Key Features: -Backup & Restore + Backup SMS & MMS messages to cloud, messages never get lost + Restore deleted or lost SMS & MMS message whenever - Caller ID + Identify numbers in real time - even those not in your contact list + Get warnings for more than 1 million spam numbers worldwide - Calls with Messages + One click text a contact after each call. No need to input number again + Access other Messages features directly from caller ID screen - Schedule SMS + Delayed SMS message give opportunity to correct the wrong message + Never miss any big moment with schedule SMS Messages - Private Box + Encrypt messages or contacts & lock down with private box + Hide private box icon to protect privacy from being snooped - SMS Blocker + No worry about spam messages consume storage space with blocker + Block text messages via adding to SMS blocker - Free Funny sms collection + 20+ categories SMS messages you can choose + Love SMS, flirt SMS, romantic SMS, friendship SMS, greeting SMS and more - Funny Emoji Message + Fast text 5000+ funny face, emoji & emoticons from messages directly + Great display of funny face, emoji & emoticons in text message - Funny Messages: + Messages support all new funny emoji & funny face in SMS + Support update multiple emoji in SMS + Support Unicorn, Middle Finger, Taco Rainbow and more funny emoji - Free Animated GIF & Emoji ART + Share thousands of trending hot GIFs MMS via MMS + Share unique Emoji Art & funny face with friends via SMS - Customization SMS Themes + Tons of amazing messaging themes + Customize SMS background as you wish - Messages Customization + Customize texting bubble, SMS bubble, color, font & wallpaper + Take photo as wallpaper or choose wallpaper from photo gallery - Auto reply messages: + Driving Mode disable message notifications from messages or stock messages except phone call + Auto Reply when Driving Mode is turned on, keep distractions to a minimum - MORE FEATURES + Send picture, audio, video MMS messages to more than one friends for once time + Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste text messages + Pop up new message for a quick view and quick reply + Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for in free text messages + Custom bubble themes. + Support all emojis, send and receive emoji with your friend. + Custom font for conversation list, thread, popup message dialog. + Beautiful popup message dialog, support more pages popup dialog. + Blink LED when new message arrived.
